summary: This bat file will add every shout (But NOT unlock it)
descriptionHtml:
This mod basically unlocks ALL the shouts. 
I\'ve always been very lazy to get all those shouts...

You will still need to unlock them tough! 
So it\'s not COMPLETELY cheated

simply extract the file into your skyrim main folder (where TESV.exe is located) folder.

USE:
1.) Open the console by pressing ยง
2.) Type: bat addshouts
3.) Enjoy

I DO take requests. Just send me a pm

As above, Enjoy
author: GeezasMods
